Romm inc
Hotel berada di dalam kawasan BTC Mall. Ketika kami masuk ternyata loby hotel berada diatas. Sepintas loby hotel milenials sekali, Interior terkesan modern dan bersih. text:
Saya menginap selama 3 malam di hotel ini dari tanggal 9 Juni s.d 12 Juni, berikut ulasan saya : 

1. Lokasi (rating ✴✴✴✴)
Lokasi berada di Mall BTC Fashion Mall. Sangat strategis. Sangat dekat dengan tol pasteur. Disekitar hotel banyak kendaraan umum (angkot dan taxi) yang lewat. Kekurangannya adalah kalau sore pas jam pulang kantor menuju BTC sangat macet, apalagi pas weekend. Tapi jangan hawatir, untuk makanan dan belanja fashion, di mall BTC sangat lengkap penjual makanan dan fashion. Ada juga bioskop. Sehingga tidak perlu keluar dari hotel.

2.  Fasilitas (rating ✴✴✴)
Fasilitas di hotel ini standart bintang 3. Ada restaurant, dan ada juga massage. Yang membawa keluarga tidak perlu hawatir karena menyatu dengan mall BTC ada time zone buat main anak. Cuma sayangnya fasilitas parkir menyatu dengan mal. Tidak ada perbedaan parkir hotel dan pengunjung mall BTC, sehingga pada hari minggu kita akan kesulitan mencari parkir mobil. Saya hampir satu jam mencari parkir, karena semua tempat parkir sangat penuh dengan pengunjung mall BTC yang akan belanja dan beribadah.  

3. Bedroom (rating ✴✴✴)
Kamar tidak begitu luas. Tapi kebersihan cukup terjaga dengan baik. Fasilitas di kamar hanya ada TV LCD yang dilengkapi dengan saluran tv kabel. Kemudian ada kettel pemanas air yang dilengkapi oleh 2 buah air mineral dan teh/kopi. Kasur cukup nyaman dan tidak teralu empuk. Tapi bantal sangat tidak nyaman karena sangat lembek sehingga seperti tidak memakai bantal. Saya beberapa hari menginap disana hari kedua jadi sakit leher. Hotel perlu mengganti semua bantal dengan jenis bantal yang lebih nyaman seharusnya. Pemandangan dari kamar bisa melihat kota bandung. AC jugan cukup bekerja dengan baik. Ada Wifi yang koneksi nya cukup baik dan kencang. 

4. Bathroom (rating ✴✴✴)
Kamar mandi tidak luas. Amenities mandi ada handuk, sikat gigi, sisir dan hair dryer. Kebersihan juga cukup terjaga dengan baik. Tapi sayang toilet flushnya sudah rusak keras. Kemudian ada shower yang air panas nya berjalan dengan baik. 

5. Service (rating ✴✴✴)
Proses c.in dan c.out sangat cepat. Petugas reception ramah dan ketika kami c.in berusaha memberikan kamar sesuai dengan request kami. Tapi sayang tidak ada petugas yang membantu kami membawakan barang ketika kami c.in, sehingga kami membawa barang yang banyak sendirian. Cukup merepotkan karena kami membawa anak kecil. 

6. Food & Beverage (rating ✴✴)
Makanan sangat standart malah menurut saya buruk untuk ukuran bintang 3. Karena variasi makanan hanya ada nasi, lauk dan sayur saja. Ada roti tawar yang ketika kami sahur pada hari minggu tidak ada mentega hanya ada meses saja. Gimana ceritanya makan roti hanya pake meses tanpa mentega???. Untuk kualitas rasa menurut saya sangat standart saja. 

Kesimpulan 
Hotel ini yang ingin ke bandung belanja fashion dapat memenuhin ekspetasi kita. Untuk keperluan dinas maupun keluarga boleh di coba. Tapi menurut saya kalau membeli voucher melalui Online Travel Agent tidak perlu dengan breakfast cukup room only dengan kualitas makanan untuk breakfast/ sahur seperti saya sebut diatas. Makanan banyak yang menjual di mallnya, sehingga lebih enak membeli dari mall.
title: Surganya pencinta belanja

Kalau tidak salah harga normal mendekati Rp.700,000.-

Lokasi strategis berdempetan dengan mall, apabila mall tutup, maka jalan kaki lumayan jauh. Nilai plusnya karena ada mall.

Kamar apik, rapi, bersih & sangat minimalis. Tersedia coffee maker berikut coffee sachet & teh sachet, gula pasir, creamer masing-masing 2 sachet, gula Tropicana Slim 1 sachet. Tersedia sandal dalam kamar, TV LCD dengan beragam channel. Lampu penerangan KURANG.

Kamar Mandi tersedia handuk besar 2pcs, sabun ketul 2 pcs, shampoo 1 tube, sikat gigi 2 pcs, sanatary bag 1 pcs, cutton bud, hair dryer. TIDAK TERSEDIA SISIR.

Kamar tidak kedap suara, bunyi bising siram closet kamar tetangga bisa membuat kita terjaga dari tidur yang pulas.

Sarapan di lobby hotel, Masakkan beragam 1 lauk, 1 sayur, telur, nasi goreng, nasi putih, roti bakar, bubur ketan kacang hijau, mie kuah, buah-buahan, kopi & teh + air putih. TIDAK TERSEDIA RUANG UNTUK PEROKOK.

PERLU PENINGKATAN:
KAMAR MANDI perlu ditambah sisir, sabun mandi cair (liquid), handuk kecil, tempat tissue rol diganti.
KAMAR TIDUR penerangan ditambah, TV tidak buram, upayakan sekat ruang.
LORONG KE KAMAR, dipertimbangkan ditempel himbauan tidak berteriak seperti terjadi kebakaran.
SARAPAN tersedia petugas pembuat omelet sehingga tidak dingin. Mentega & Selai jangan ditempatkan di mangkok besar, perlu ditambah paling tidak 2 jenis makanan/makanan untuk menyamakan dengan hotel setara yang ada. Petugas tambahan untuk menuangkan kopi/teh di meja. KARYAWAN HOTEL DILARANG IKUT NIMBRUNG SARAPAN DIMEJA TERSEDIA UNTUK TAMU.
Internet WiFi disetting ulang jangan idle 60detik sudah harus login lagi, Kecepatan akses juga perlu ditingkatkan.
LOBBY, saat check-in jangan diharuskan menunggu 45menit karena TV bermasalah. Petugas penawar SPA jangan menawarkan seperti kelas murahan (LANTANG AMAT Nawarnya, yang mau juga bisa malu kali).

SUDAH BAGUS;
Keamanan dipertahankan dengan keycard pada lift perlu diacung jempol.
Keramahan petugas dan variasi seragam kerja WAJAR diberikan bintang 5.
Penguasaan bahasa Inggris frontdesk sudah bagus.
Kerjasama dengan biro TAXI bernama.

Rencana menginap 2 malam akhir diurungkan jadi 1 malam karena faktor diatas.
KESIMPULAN PRIBADI; untuk harga dibanding kondisi hotel secara keseluruhan dianggap MAHAL, untuk fasilitas yang sama bisa didapat pada hotel lain dengan harga yang lebih murah.
(simak review pribadi saya yang lain----semua pernyataan diatas merupakan situasi yang dialami pada tanggal menginap dan tidak mencerminkan kondisi keseluruhan kamar tersedia pada hotel).
title: Lokasi Strategis, Kamar Sempit

text:
Saya sering bepergian ke Bandung dan mencoba tinggal di hotel-hotel yang berbeda. Hotel ini dapat direkomendasikan untuk semua pengunjung.

Kelebihan:
- menyatu dengan mal sehingga Anda bisa berbelanja, makan, mencari hiburan, dan lain lain. Di mal terdapat agen perjalanan dan juga agen Cipaganti untuk pergi ke Jakarta.
- harga yang masuk akal. Kamar Deluxe 400 ribu rupiah.
- akses yang mudah, sekitar 500 meter dari gerbang tol Pasteur.
- beberapa kendaraan umum lewat di depan hotel.
- parkir mobil mudah karena juga menyatu dengan gedung parkir. Jangan lupa meminta stempel di resepsionis agar tidak perlu membayar biaya parkir, 500 ribu rupiah semalam!
- jarak berkendara yang dekat ke lokasi hiburan lain dan mal seperti Paris van Java, Gedung Sate, Cihampelas, Institut Teknologi Bandung, Rumah Sakit Hasan Sadikin
- sarapan standar dan enak. Saya suka bubur ayamnya. Tersedia omelette, buah potong, jus buah segar, bubur, nasi, sayuran, dan lainnya
- shower mengesankan. Kamar mandi bersih.

Kekurangan:
- pintu masuk hotel sulit ditemukan karena berada di gedung parkir. Terutama jika mal sudah tutup, tamu tanpa mobil pribadi harus berjalan melewati area parkir.
- pintu masuk hotel bukanlah lobi, melainkan dua lift. Pengunjung harus naik lift sebelum mencapai lobi.
- AC split di kamar berisik

Secara keseluruhan, menyenangkan menginap di sini.
title: Bagus, efisien, nyaman

text:
Stayed at BTC last year while accompanying my wife on a conference held by her office.

I don’t remember there being any different types of room that you can book. Just that you can choose between twin beds and single bed. The room size itself is good if you’re traveling by yourself. But when you’ve got your spouse, a baby, your things, and all the things the baby need the room does get full quickly.

In terms of food, I ordered room service one night and found it to be standard. They did better at breakfast in terms of both taste and the options they have. I like the yellow jam that they have.

In terms of facilities, this hotel is very much geared towards companies wanting to have conferences. There are plenty of meeting rooms but little in the way of gyms and pools.

The service provided by the staff is good though I think the hotel is understaffed. Called in housekeeping one night to clean the room and got a security guard instead conducting the duties of housekeeping. Housekeeping itself needs to be improved, still plenty of dust under the bed after several days of asking that the dust be cleaned.

Do take care of your items. I left my headset on the bedside table and that was the end of it. One night I returned and never saw it again.

Overall, this is a good hotel to stay at for business and provided you don’t expect too much from it.
title: Good For What It Is

text: Checked in for 1 night. Business trip to Bandung. Pricing was in the range I have come to expect for small city hotel. Check in was quick and while I waited, I got myself a cup of coffee in the lobby. Was asked what room to charge coffee to so told them. Room was ok except the shower floor has soap all over it so I had to wash that out to stop myself slipping on the floor. Get knock on the door saying that I need to pay for the coffee in cash. I guess they are worried I will skip the country because of a 30k rupiah cup of coffee. I pay and told they need to go get change. Two phone calls later asking if we want change which we eventually got when I was about to go out to my meeting. Got back late, slept. Bed comfortable and went down for breakfast. Asian style buffet but all the trays are almost empty and staff standing around just looking at it. Nobody is refilling the serving hot trays. Go over to the fresh fruits and the bowl of cucumber is crawling with insects. Complain to the waiter and return to my table and then one of the senior waiters comes to me and propose to make me a fresh dish from the kitchen (but leave the insect covered one where it is in front of everybody). I stood up and told him that if that how proposes to solve this problem I wont touch any food made by him and left. Will check out, go get breakfast elsewhere and avoid this hotel or any associated entities going forwards. Over charged, over rated, shocking quality control.
title: Had potential, wasted by apathy.

This is my first stay in BTC Fashion Hotel pasteur. Its located in Pasteur Area (the street to the toll way to Jakarta). Because of the hotel is join with a mall, its located on the top of the mall. the lobby start from the very top stairs of the BTC Mall. If you go from the enterance of BTC Mall, just ask security where is there elevator access to the hotel, then they will give direction to just go straight then you will find it in the behind of mall. 

I would like to say the service is okay, I don't feel the extra mille one. Since entering the room until I checked out, I can not connect to the wifi. So does my cousin. Their breakfast is good. There's congee station, egg station, rice, chicken, toasted bread, fresh juice, tea and coffee, also traditional cake of Bandung like kue balok etc. I seldom find it in any other hotel. Room was good and clean. Only the twin bed is too small. For you who come here using taxi, they will drop you in the highest level of the mall, it's so high and creepy LOL. And for you who drive your own vehicle you can park your car anywhere but recommended to choose car park near by the basement hotel lift. AHA! One more things, they room service menu is soooo cheap, as a hotel price.

text:
I have stayed here for my graduation back in 2013, and last January I stayed there again for 3 nights and booked via OTA (Traveloka/Airy Rooms) and got a very great deal.
The location is very strategic, it's very near to Tol Pasteur, Maranatha University, and the building itself connected with a shopping centre. The distance from the airport is not too far, either. For transportation, don't worry because there are so many Angkots or taxis around the Hotel. There's a lot of food stall in the shopping centre's food court, from fast food, chinese, japanese, Sundanese and other Indonesian food, and western food. there's also Movie Theatres at the building. The breakfast is just so so, but egg must be requested and they took pretty long to get my omellete and sunny side up ready.
As far as I know they only have 1 room type, but you can request double or twin bed. the bed is comfortable enough, but the pillow is too soft for my liking.. Room size is adequate, not too small, not too big, just enough space to put your belongings and move around in the room. The bathroom is quite clean and the water pressure is good, hot & cold water adjustment is good, too. and they provide hairdryer in every room! Super Love it! What I hate the most is the lighting, they set the lighting to be warm and dim. It's great when you're sleeping, but when I need to apply my makeup in the evening, it feels like I applied my makeup without mirror :( I hope the Management could consider to installing a dressing lamp at the dressing table.
title: Great for staying in Bandung

owner_response.text:

We truly look forward to welcoming you back on your next trip to Bandung.

Best Regards,


Tin Kartini
Hotel Manager

text: Had a chance to stay here for a night. My first experience with Airy property but my feedback was positive. The hospitality is OK for a budget hotel and the size of the room is decent (only twin beds setup is available). Facilities including hot water shower, clean towels, wifi and free bottled waters plus few cholocate snacks. The location is basically on the few top floors of BTC Mall Parking Building hence access to the hotel can be tricky for those who did not review before. Breakfast is included but I did not get the chance to try them as I went outside for breakfast. Overall the stay is cheap and OK, however please take note that the smell from the toilet can be too much, but you can close the toilet door to block them.

text:
21 March 2014

Reached around 1pm, was given early check in without charges (i guess subject to room availability also).

Smoking rooms are at lower levels, was given 101 for my stay.

Hotel is joined with the BTC fashion mall; hotel staff were pleasant, excellent services.

Cleanliness was 5/5 (Room was cleaned daily, without request, with clean towels, emptied dustbins and unfolded clothing were folded - i have been to some hotels where they do not even clean your rooms for you).

Breakfast was 5/5 (different food was served each day) there were fruits, tea/coffee/ bread, plates were cleaned promptly, service was rendered excellently. Breakfast was on the same floor as reception.

Room was 4/5. there is no fridge however. safe and hangers were provided. the room wasn't soundproof as i can hear some outside activities. the aircon was working but there are noises. 2 bottled waters were given complimentary daily, with tea/coffee/sugar/creamer. ashtray was only given on Sunday but not much of an issue. 

Bathroom was 4/5. basic stuffs were given - shampoo, soap, cotton buds, sanitary bag, toilet paper, toothbrush for two, towels, door mat, hairdryer. the showering area drainage wasn't working as it smell quite abit and there are water stuck, but not much of an issue though. we survived :)

There are 3 charging outlets, one in between the beds, another in the bathroom(for hairdryer) and one for water flask.

Security - only one access card is provided and u need to insert your card to enter the hotel rooms, level 1 upwards...

Overall, service was excellent. Will definitely come back again, as the hotel is strategically located near to the airport (less than 30 mins the most - however if departing on mornings, please leave early as traffic jam can be an issue - we left at 730am and there was a huge jam) and there is hypermart in the mall (handy if u want to buy bottled water and stuffs for hotel use)

Thanks Bandung for the memories!
title: Excellent hotel

spent 2 days in this hotel, staying at the 8th floor, neat, small room but okay, bathroom okay, some crack on the wall near the window, but the curtains covered it, some stains on curtains.

Breakfast okay, good food, not a lot of variety though, but the menus at 2nd days changed from the 1st, so it's okay.

text:
My friend and I stayed there from 16-19 May. We chose this hotel because it was located near the airport, in order to avoid the infamous traffic jams at Bandung when we went back.

We hired a personal driver and I think we spent more than half the time in Bandung on the road. The traffic volume is high, though the drivers and riders are quite patient and nice enough to let you jaywalk (without giving you a rude sign or sounding the horn endlessly) if you need to cross the road.

The hotel is great for the price. They kept our luggage when we arrived before check-in time and service is friendly and prompt. The room is spacious and what we loved best is the many channels, including HBO and AFC that the hotel had. Some hotels in Bandung only have local channels. The bathroom tiles had some mold but it is not that bad. There were also some cracked tiles and a slight sewage smell emitting from the drainage at the shower area. I can live with that. What was crazy was the WIFI.

On our first night, we called the reception for the WIFI password and was given one. I logged in successfully and when my friend tried to log in, hers was denied. We checked with the reception and was told that ID and password was for 1 log in only. Huh? My friend asked for another one and the receptionist obliged. Happily I thought that would be the end of the WIFI issues. Nope. If you log in but do not use for a while, it automatically logs off. So every time we get back to the hotel, we need to log in. On the second night, when we tried the IDs and passwords again, both were denied. This time the reception gave us another ID and password that would allow two simultaneous log in. The automatic log off still happened, of course. Guess this is to prevent dormant users taking up log in slots? 

Breakfast was simple, mostly catered to local tastes. The 2 days we chose to eat breakfast, the food selections were almost the same. The taste is quite decent. Do try the rice and other dishes. As informed by my friend, rice with sides of chicken or beef and vegetables is a typical Bandung breakfast. I tried the chicken porridge (bubur ayam), another typical breakfast item, and it was thicker than what I usually eat, though still tasty.

Location wise, it is just atop a shopping mall which sells some of the cheapest stuff we have found in Bandung. This distressed my friend, who had paid for the same stuff for 10% more at stalls in other markets/malls. There are many small shops in the mall. Take your time to walk and browse through. The higher the level, the likelier you can find the same item for a cheaper price. 

The food court has a wide selection and it is different in that after you order, you are given a number, the food will be sent to you and you can sit anywhere you like. Usually food courts like this in my country operates on self-service.

Pros:
1) Location
2) Convenience - shopping mall and food court located just below

Cons:
1) WIFI (constant logging in/ change of ID/password)
2) Bathroom tiles has mold/ needs small maintenance
title: great location

text:
This hotel is close to airport since we arrived almost 10pm in Bandung.

Well the hotel is new. So everything is new and the hotel is part of the shopping mall.

The room is small but new and clean. We have no problem with it as it is comfortable.

Breakfast is limited and we are lucky to go down for breakfast early because the hotel do not replenish the breakfast. It is as good first come first serve. The last get nothing to eat. 

However food is easy to find within the shopping mall. There is KFC at the end of the mall which open until late nite.

Unfortunately the hotel does not has direct access to the mall. You have to walk about 100 metres thru the parking lots to the mall's entrance.

This hotel is great for short stay and transit to Jakarta because there is a shuttle service to Jakarta by Cipa Ganti (ground floor of the Mall).
title: New hotel but small room
